name: APatontheBack
0:
”Alexa, open A Pat on the Back”
”Alexa, launch A Pat on the Back”
”Alexa, start A Pat on the Back”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a pat on the back
des:
A Pat on the Back is a way to get a little bit of encouragement or inspiration whenever you need it. 

Let Alexa give you a short, inspiring message to perk up your day. You've just gotten A Pat on the Back!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
